H0.text: Ecuador has a border with Peru and which other country . Brazil

H1.text: Ecuador has a border with Peru and which other country . Argentina

H2.text: Ecuador has a border with Peru and which other country . Chile

H3.text: Ecuador has a border with Peru and which other country . Colombia

A4.text: Ecuador is bordered by Colombia on the north, Peru on the east and south, and the Pacific Ocean on the west.
